Oleksandr Boiko

➛ Paris, France.
➛ Passionate about computer vision, machine learning, fashion, and cognitive sciences
➛ Made in Ukraine

LinkedIn Github e-Mail

Hello and Welcome!

My name is Oleksandr, I am a recent graduate student from Erasmus + Joint Master Degree COSI (Color in Science and Industry).

My specialties are Machine/Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Computational Imaging, and Color Science.

I have experience working on computer vision tasks using classical and deep learning methods in both industrial (Olympus Corp., Japan, Vilmorin, France) and academia fields (SIB Labs, Finland).

I graduated from three universities (UJM, France, UEF, Finland, UGR, Spain) in 2 years. In addition, I am MSc in Applied Physics and Nanomaterials.

Passionate about photography and fashion. Some links to explore my life out of studies: Instagram, Goodreads, 500px, and Lookbook.

Hope you have a great day!
